Git commands

Jan 5, 2018

This post is about Git commands

git add .

Add all files from current directory into index

git status

Show status in the workspace and index

git commit -m "commit message"

Commit all files in the index into local responsitory

git clone [responsitory link]

Clone a repository into a newly created local directory

git push

Push local reponsitory to remote reponsitory

git remote add [remote-name] [url]

Set a new remote

git pull [remote] [branch]

incorporate changes from a remote repository into the current branch
